channel.title: data joins on Needle in the Hay
channel.description: Recent content in data joins on Needle in the Hay

item.title: Five R tips from my Voices.com internship
item.author: hmd@needleinthehay.ca (Hayden MacDonald)
item.description: 1. Removing similarly-named objects from R’s Global Environment 2. coord_cartesian() for zooming in on ggplots 3. Intra-figure legends in ggplot2 graphics 4. High resolution plot outputs via CairoPNG() 5. Fuzzy joins on intervals with genome_left_join() Conclusion This summer, I had the pleasure of working as a Data Analyst Intern at Voices.com as a part of my MSc in Business Analytics. Voices.com is a marketplace website that matches business clients with voice-over talent.
